system.description:
This spell functions like the Create Normal Monsters spell but allows the creation of monsters with up to two asterisks (special abilities). The range and duration are doubled compared to the lesser spell.

Monster Creation

  • The caster chooses the type of monsters created.
  • Creatures appear out of thin air and vanish at the end of the duration.
  • The total number of Hit Dice created equals the level of the caster (fractions are dropped).
  • Undead can be created, but humans and demihumans cannot.
  • Monsters with 1-1 Hit Dice count as 1 HD, while creatures with 1/2 HD or less count as 1/2 HD.

Construct Creation

This spell can also create a construct (see Chapter 14) if the caster provides the necessary materials. Only one construct will appear, but it is permanent and does not vanish when the duration ends.

Construct Rules

  • The construct may have a maximum of two special abilities (two asterisks).
  • The cost of materials is at least 5,000 gold pieces per asterisk, though the DM may require more.
  • The construct can be dispelled under normal rules unless enchanted as a nondispellable construct (see Chapter 16).
system.effect: Creates one or more magical monsters
